meanings: be in a transport of joy

vlive.korean: 너무 기뻐서 눈물 나요? Are you crying because you're so happy? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#574. 오마이갓세븐 (스페셜 DJ 갓세븐 JB&영재 with 갓세븐)
vlive.english: Are you crying because you're so happy?

vlive.korean: [메이가 벌써 1살 나 너무 기뻐서 아파트 1층부터 꼭대기층까지] 여러분 다 같이 박수~ [MAY is already 1. I'm so happy I ran to the top floor of the apartment] Everyone, applause! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [PARK JI HOON] 저 한 살인데요 118억살까지 메이 할 겁니다🎂 (JI HOON decorating cake for MAY)
vlive.english: [MAY is already 1. I'm so happy I ran to the top floor of the apartment] Everyone, applause!

vlive.korean: 기뻐서요. - 기뻐서? I was just so happy. - So happy? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : [Full] 'IDOL RADIO' ep#2. 우리는 최강 아이돌 (with B.A.P영재, 권현빈)
vlive.english: I was just so happy. - So happy?

vlive.korean: 기뻐서 우나? Is it crying because its happy? 듣기 View video INFINITE : [FULL] NAM WOO HYUN 2nd MINI ALBUM [Second Write..] COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: Is it crying because its happy?

vlive.korean: 오늘 너무 기뻐서 언어 능력이... Oh, I am too excited to control my language skills. 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 슈화의 생일을 축하합니다🎂♥️
vlive.english: Oh, I am too excited to control my language skills.

examples.korean: They grinned with delight when they heard our news. 발음듣기 그들은 우리의 소식을 듣고 기뻐서 활짝 웃었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They grinned with delight when they heard our news. 발음

examples.korean: a squeal of delight 발음듣기 기뻐서 꺄악 지르는 비명 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The children squealed with delight when they saw the puppy. 발음듣기 강아지를 보자 아이들이 기뻐서 소리를 깩깩 질렀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children squealed with delight when they saw the puppy. 발음

examples.korean: to groan with pain / pleasure 발음듣기 아파서 신음 소리를 내다/기뻐서 낮게 탄성을 지르다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to groan with pain / pleasure 발음

examples.korean: ‘We won!’ she exulted. 발음듣기 “우리가 이겼어!” 그녀가 기뻐서 어쩔 줄 모르며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
